verses.roman:
ei cāri mili' tomāya dhuturā khāoyāñā
tomāra dhana laila tomāya pāgala kariyā

synonyms: ei cāri mili'-four rogues together; tomāya—You; dhuturā khāoyāñā—making to drink poison; tomāra—Your; dhana—wealth; laila—took away; tomāya—You; pāgala—intoxicated; kariyā—making.
translation: "These rogues have made You take dhuturā. Having made You mad, they have taken all Your possessions."
